backend/main.mo: Motoko backend providing user profile management with access control and CRUD operations for storing and listing customer inquiries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten one-line summaries for key frontend components, pages, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS layer defining industrial-themed OKLCH color variables and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting SEO metadata, loading Inter font, and mounting the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router and defines routes for all main pages wrapped in the Layout component.
frontend/src/components/InquiryForm.tsx: Form component with validation and success/error handling that formats and submits inquiries to the backend.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper containing SiteHeader, routed content via Outlet, and SiteFooter.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer displaying company info, navigation links, and contact details with social icons.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header component with logo, desktop navigation, and toggleable mobile menu using router state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitInquiry.ts: React Query mutation hook that submits an inquiry through the backend actor and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React, React Query, and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page describing the company's background and core values with styled content sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page showing address, phone, email, hours, and an inquiry form within a two-column layout.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with a hero section, call‑to‑action links, and highlight cards showcasing product quality, range, and delivery.
frontend/src/pages/ManufacturingPage.tsx: Displays manufacturing facility details, capacity stats, and process overview using icon-based info cards.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Renders a product catalog grid with descriptions and specifications for various fastener types.
frontend/src/pages/QualityPage.tsx: Presents the company's quality philosophy and lists key certifications with icon-based cards.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based query handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Defines project configuration for building the Guru Kirpa Mill Industries website, listing features, image requirements, and pending requests. Contains project metadata, existing features, and backend needs for inquiry storage.
